mapper.insert: insert into USER_REMEMBER(username, words, grade, textbook, lesson) values(#{username}, #{words}, #{grade}, #{textbook}, #{lesson} )
mapper.select: select words from USER_REMEMBER where username = #{username} and grade = #{grade} and textbook = #{textbook} and lesson = #{lesson}
select count(*) from USER_REMEMBER where username = #{username} and grade = #{grade} and textbook = #{textbook} and lesson = #{lesson}
mapper.update: update USER_REMEMBER SET words = #{words} where username = #{username} and grade = #{grade} and textbook = #{textbook} and lesson = #{lesson}
